author: alfred_the_buttler
title: Great set for learning and designing
review:
My son got this as a 3 year old and loves it.  It allows him to create all sorts of robots, and has enough pieces that we can usually create two robots at a time, or a robot and a space ship.  Unfortunately, there aren't any instructions, but the box shows a lot of different designs so this wound up being the only Duplo box we ever kept as my son points to which design he wants me to build.  It also became the only Duplo set we never combined with other sets.

Connecting the diggers and crane arms was very difficult for him when we first got this, but a year later it is fairly easy.  The fact that they can combined in multiple ways and to create multiple robot body is parts is fantastic.

I highly recommend for any kid that loves robots or Miles, truly a fantastic set!
